message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire an item that is worth $10,000 to you at a competitive price. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're offering, $11,500 is still a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product, which is a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know if you're open to discussing this further.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. I would like to offer the product to you for $10,800. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I hope this offer is more in line with what you're looking for.
